titleStmt.title: Memorials of worthy persons (lights and ornaments of the Church of England.), the fourth decad. / by Cl. Barksdale.
Memorials of worthy persons. Decade 4
titleStmt.author: Barksdale, Clement, 1609-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. and L. Lichfield,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library.

Bound and filmed with Wing B790A: Apanthismata. memorials of worthy persons, lights and ornaments of the Church of England, two new decads. Oxford : Printed by A. and L. Lichfield and are to be sold by S. Thomson, 1664.
